mapper.select: SELECT company_id as companyId, name, business_number as businessNumber, business_type as businessType, size, founding_year as foundingYear, employee_count as employeeCount, address, phone, email, website, logo, intro, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM company WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO company ( member_id, name, business_number, business_type, size, founding_year, employee_count, address, phone, email, website, logo, intro, created_at ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, #{companyVo.name}, #{companyVo.businessNumber}, #{companyVo.businessType}, #{companyVo.size}, #{companyVo.foundingYear}, #{companyVo.employeeCount}, #{companyVo.address}, #{companyVo.phone}, #{companyVo.email}, #{companyVo.website}, #{companyVo.logo}, #{companyVo.intro}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE company SET name = #{name}, business_number = #{businessNumber}, business_type = #{businessType}, size = #{size}, founding_year = #{foundingYear}, employee_count = #{employeeCount}, address = #{address}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, website = #{website}, logo = #{logo}, intro = #{intro}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE company_id = #{companyId}

mapper.select: SELECT member_id as memberId, id, password, role, state FROM member WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET password = #{password}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT a.applications_id AS applicationId, a.user_id AS userId, u.name AS userName, u.phone_number AS userPhone, a.job_id AS jobId, j.title AS jobTitle, dt.disability_name AS disabilityType, DATE_FORMAT(a.applied_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS appliedDate FROM applications a INNER JOIN user u ON a.user_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN job_posting j ON a.job_id = j.job_id LEFT JOIN disability_types dt ON u.disability_type_id = dt.id WHERE j.company_id = #{companyId} ORDER BY a.applied_at DESC
